author: fdmanana
msg: Avoid ocassional replication.js test failures due to timing issues
This happens mostly on slower machines.

author: fdmanana
msg: If there's no progress with a remote _changes stream, retry
up to 10 times with an increasing pause period before each
retry attempt. If there's progress retry immediately - any
other connection (worker connections) that fails 10 times will
end up aborting the replication process.

author: xuhaihong
msg: AXIS2-5022 Support addressing meta data with policy 1.5 framework, Fix a typo error.

author: jakobk
msg: update version on download site to 0.9.5
